text: As a new blogger, this is the first time I am nominating for the The Edublog Awards.  There have been so many bloggers who have inspired me to think and learn (and blog!)  in the past year or so! These are my nominations in a few of the categories:
Oh wow.  I’m so flattered and very grateful.  Just to have someone reading the blog has been reward enough, so many thanks Ed.  Feel spurred on!
